item.title: Version 17-51
item.description: C source code for version 17-51. win32 binary available from the home page. Version 17-51 fixes a bug in v17-50 with --splitvariations.

item.title: Version 17-50
item.description: C source code for version 17-50. win32 binary available from the home page. Version 17-50 fixes some bugs, adds a PlyCount tag, adds further options to deal with games with inconsistent result indications, better recognition of null moves, and further support for Chess960 games, among other things, See the Change history in the help file for further details.

item.title: Version 17-38
item.description: C source code for version 17-38. win32 binary available from the home page. Version 17-38 adds functionality similar to pgnsplit with --splitvariants.

item.title: Version 17-37
item.description: C source code for version 17-37. win32 binary available from the home page. Version 17-37 fixes failure when -x and -n are used together, and lack of output with -W; extends --selectonly to multiple games and ranges; adds --skipmatching to suppress games; corrects some missing PGN info from games.

item.title: Version 17-34
Version 17-30
item.description: C source code for version 17-30. win32 binary available from the home page. Version 17-30 adds recognition of Chess960 FEN encodings, substring matches on tags, detection of position quiescence, correction of Result tag where it is clearly in conflict with the game termination.

item.title: Version 17-22
item.description: C source code for version 17-22. win32 binary available from the home page. Version 17-22 adds warnings for games ending in checkmate or stalemate that have inconsistent result tags. There are also new options to detect games with 3-fold repetition and the fifty-move rule.

item.title: Version 17-21
item.description: C source code for version 17-21. win32 binary available from the home page. Version 17-21 corrects various errors; e.g. in the half-move clock on castling and pawn promotion, and game counting with -#. It also adds the new command-line option --nofauxep and output format -Wxlalg.

item.title: Version 17-19
item.description: C source code for version 17-19. win32 binary available from the home page. Version 17-19 corrects errors with -T and the calculation of game hashcodes. It also adds new command-line options: --keepbroken, --totalplycount, --addhashcode and --selectonly.

item.title: Version 17-14 (.exe version)
item.description: Version of the 32-bit Windows executable added that does not require cygwin. pgn-extract-17-14-non-cygwin 29 Jun 2013 11:55:00 GMT

item.title: Version 17-14
item.description: C source code for version 17-14. Version 17-14 adds null-move (--) recognition in variations, corrects an error in the whole-move number in FEN output, and corrects a minor inconsistency in variation naming in eco.pgn.

item.title: Version 17-13
item.description: C source code for version 17-13. Version 17-13 adds -Wuci for output in a form suitable for use as input to a UCI-compatible engine, and --fuzzydepth for ply-specific duplicates matching.

item.title: Version 17-12
item.description: C source code for version 17-12. Version 17-12 is a minor bug fix for version 17-11.

item.title: New in version 17-11
item.description: 1) Fuzzy board matches via a regular-expression like syntax. 2) A test suite of the basic functionality.
